objects.text: Breathable Mesh Vamp | Slip-Resistant Sole | Free Running Design

product_details.description: Super Breathable Mesh Vamp: Lightweight, Soft, Comfortable, Wash resistance, They won't deform after clean the sneakers. Breathable and durable air mesh upper allow the foot to breathe. Protect Your ankle: Slip-on ankle design allows you easily put on/off. Shoes's tongue and heels protect your feet from hurt in any activities. Provide more comfort. Slip-Resistance and Durable:Premium Hollow Blade Sole Offers Maximum Durability and Provides the Optimum Cushioning Performance that Creates a Slow Shock Jump, Soft, Comfortableand and Healthier Shoe Environment. Perfect choice to pair with any sport or casual assemble. Suitable for parties, casual, walking, running, indoor, sports, outdoor, travel, exercise, workout and any occasion. Free Running: Stretch breathable mesh upper for ultra-lightweight support and breathability, springblade sole can superb energy return and durability, ensures your feet feel more freedom, allowing to move the way they were meant to, to enjoy the unparalleled pleasure of free running. Fabric type - Mesh ** Origin - Imported ** Sole material - Ethylene Vinyl Acetate ** Outer material - Mesh **

banner_details:
This modern and bold banner features a dark-themed, high-contrast background with gradient tones ranging from pure black to deep gray. The central visual focal point is a sharply rendered, floating product image (id: "product_image"), accented by precise geometric guide lines and curvature that subtly hint toward a radial grid. The headline (id: "heading") is large and highly visible, presented in a clean sans-serif uppercase font, centered toward the top. Just below is a smaller subheading (id: "subheading") describing the product category. A line of key features (id: "description") runs horizontally across the lower mid-section. The price (id: "price") stands out brightly, followed by a distinct call-to-action button comprised of a rectangular shape (id: "cta_background") and its text (id: "cta"). The careful layout, contrast, and minimalist icons enhance the modern aesthetic, ideal for advertising premium athletic footwear.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: #000000  
- Charcoal Gray: #202020  
- Light Gray: #CCCCCC  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of fashion-forward athletic shoes, predominantly in a deep matte black (#000000) which exudes a bold, sleek aesthetic. Accents of cool gray (#B0B0B0) are used in vertical stripes and branding, providing contrast and drawing attention to design elements without overwhelming the core color. White (#FFFFFF) text on the straps adds a sharp highlight that enhances visibility and brand presence. The black dominates the structure and form, while the gray and white subtly blend in to provide modern, minimalistic detailing. Together, they create a balanced palette perfect for an energetic and edgy advertisement banner.
